title: Patching issues
body: Ever since the recent patch came out my client does not let me download the patch and comes up with the error 003. I have tried the automatic troubleshooter (hextech repair tool) and changed other stuff but still nothing has worked. Anyone else have this issue ? or knows how to fix it.

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you please download the [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and run it with the default options selected, please upload the "LoL-Logs.zip" file that is created on your desktop to the host of your choice and reply with a link here.
